actor_awards.notes: Known for his versatility in action, romance, and Hitchcockian thrillers.

filmography.title: The Catered Affair
filmography.role_description: The earnest schoolteacher fiancé of Debbie Reynolds, caught in the middle of a family conflict over wedding expenses.
filmography.plot: A working-class mother fights to give her daughter an expensive wedding, causing tension with her husband.
filmography.awards: National Board of Review: Top Ten Films

filmography.title: Giant
filmography.role_description: A refined British aristocrat who marries the daughter of the wealthy Benedict family.
filmography.plot: Sprawling epic covering the life of a Texas cattle rancher and his family and their rivalry with cowboy and oil tycoon Jett Rink.

filmography.title: World Without End
filmography.role_description: A daring astronaut who travels through a time warp to a post-apocalyptic future Earth overrun by mutants.
filmography.plot: Four astronauts returning from a Mars voyage are caught in a time warp and crash on 26th Century Earth.

filmography.title: Raintree County
filmography.role_description: A suave, opportunistic Southern politician and rival to Montgomery Clift's character.
filmography.plot: An idealist teacher marries a beautiful but disturbed Southern belle during the American Civil War.

filmography.title: Separate Tables
filmography.role_description: A young medical student in a troubled relationship, part of the ensemble in this acclaimed drama.
filmography.plot: Several lonely people at a seaside hotel in Bournemouth, England find their lives intersecting.

filmography.title: Ask Any Girl
filmography.role_description: A smooth advertising executive who helps a naive girl trap a husband, only to fall for her himself.
filmography.plot: A young woman tries to find a husband in New York City by using modern business methods.

filmography.title: The Time Machine
filmography.role_description: A Victorian inventor who travels to the distant future, discovering a society divided into Eloi and Morlocks; his signature role.
filmography.plot: A man constructs a time machine and travels to the year 802,701 A.D., where he finds humanity divided into two warring races.

filmography.title: 101 Dalmatians
filmography.role_description: The voice of the intelligent and devoted Dalmatian father who leads the rescue mission for his puppies.
filmography.plot: When a litter of Dalmatian puppies are abducted by the minions of Cruella de Vil, the parents must find them before she uses them for a fur coat.

filmography.title: Seven Seas to Calais
filmography.role_description: The daring English explorer and privateer who raids Spanish ships for Queen Elizabeth I.
filmography.plot: Sir Francis Drake undertakes an expedition to the New World and steals gold from the Spanish to support England.

filmography.title: The Birds
filmography.role_description: A confident lawyer who protects his family and a socialite when their town is inexplicably attacked by birds.
filmography.plot: A wealthy San Francisco socialite pursues a potential boyfriend to a small Northern California town that slowly takes a turn for the bizarre when birds of all kinds suddenly begin to attack people.

filmography.title: The V.I.P.s
filmography.role_description: A charismatic Australian industrialist fighting to save his company during a layover at Heathrow Airport.
filmography.plot: A group of passengers are delayed at London Heathrow Airport by fog, forcing them to confront the crises in their personal lives.

filmography.title: A Gathering of Eagles
filmography.role_description: An Air Force Vice Commander who struggles with the intense pressure of Strategic Air Command inspections alongside Rock Hudson.
filmography.plot: An Air Force colonel is assigned to shape up a Strategic Air Command wing that has failed a surprise inspection.

filmography.title: Sunday in New York
filmography.role_description: A music critic who becomes entangled in a romantic farce with Jane Fonda's character in New York City.
filmography.plot: A young woman visiting her brother in New York faces a dilemma about her chastity while being pursued by two men.

filmography.title: Fate Is the Hunter
filmography.role_description: A pilot blamed for a fatal crash whose reputation is posthumously defended by an investigator.
filmography.plot: An airline investigator tries to uncover the true cause of a fatal plane crash, suspecting pilot error was not the cause.

filmography.title: 36 Hours
filmography.role_description: A cunning German doctor who constructs an elaborate ruse to trick an American officer into revealing D-Day plans.
filmography.plot: Germans try to get the D-Day invasion plans out of a captured American major by convincing him that the war is over.

filmography.title: Young Cassidy
filmography.role_description: A portrayal of the early life of Irish playwright Sean O'Casey as he rises from the slums of Dublin.
filmography.plot: A biographical drama about the early life of Irish playwright Sean O'Casey, involving romance and revolution.

filmography.title: The Liquidator
filmography.role_description: A reluctant, squeamish secret agent who hires assassins to do his dirty work in this spy spoof.
filmography.plot: A man is recruited by British intelligence as an assassin, but since he can't kill, he subcontracts the work.

filmography.title: Do Not Disturb
filmography.role_description: An American executive in London whose work obsessions cause comedic friction with his wife, played by Doris Day.
filmography.plot: An American couple moves to England, where the wife suspects her husband of having an affair with his secretary.

filmography.title: The Glass Bottom Boat
filmography.role_description: A space scientist who hires a widow to work for him, suspecting she might be a Russian spy.
filmography.plot: A woman who works at a space lab is mistaken for a Russian spy by her boss, who tries to catch her in the act.

filmography.title: Hotel
filmography.role_description: The dedicated manager of a historic New Orleans hotel who juggles thieves, guests, and a corporate takeover.
filmography.plot: The owner of a New Orleans hotel tries to keep it running while dealing with various guests and a corporate takeover.

filmography.title: Chuka
filmography.role_description: A gunfighter who warns a fort commander of an impending Arapaho attack in this gritty western.
filmography.plot: A gunslinger arrives at a fort commanded by a British colonel, just as starving Indians prepare to attack.

filmography.title: Dark of the Sun
filmography.role_description: A cynical mercenary leader tasked with retrieving diamonds and rescuing refugees in the war-torn Congo.
filmography.plot: A band of mercenaries led by Captain Curry travels through the Congo to rescue civilians and recover diamonds.

filmography.title: The High Commissioner
filmography.role_description: An Australian detective sent to London to arrest a high-ranking diplomat for murder.
filmography.plot: An Australian policeman travels to London to arrest the High Commissioner for a 25-year-old murder.

filmography.title: Zabriskie Point
filmography.role_description: A real estate developer who represents the establishment in Antonioni's counterculture drama.
filmography.plot: An undergraduate dropout and a young secretary meet in Death Valley after he flees a campus riot.

filmography.title: The Train Robbers
filmography.role_description: A Civil War veteran who joins John Wayne's character to help a widow recover stolen gold.
filmography.plot: A gunhand recruits a group of friends to help a widow recover gold stolen by her husband, so she can return it and clear his name.

filmography.title: Inglourious Basterds
filmography.role_description: A cameo as the British Prime Minister in Quentin Tarantino's war film; Taylor's final screen role.
filmography.plot: In Nazi-occupied France during World War II, a plan to assassinate Nazi leaders by a group of Jewish U.S. soldiers coincides with a theatre owner's vengeful plans.
